title: CAMS
description: A campus access management system designed for secure and efficient student check-ins, monitoring, and entry control using RFID integration, real-time data logging, and admin dashboards for enhanced campus security.

title: Blocky Blitz
description: Developed an interactive game using JavaFX featuring modular and reusable code architecture, multiple difficulty levels, and engaging animations, resulting in improved user experience, enhanced scalability, and increased player retention through dynamic gameplay mechanics.

title: The Academic PDF Companion
description: A web app that analyzes PDF documents using Google's Gemini API. It features simplified explanations, glossary generation, multilingual support, quizzes, chat-based Q&A, and analysis history with user authentication.

title: Dishcovery
description: Developed a recipe discovery platform that intelligently recommends dishes based on the user’s available ingredients using a custom-built recommendation algorithm, enhancing cooking efficiency, reducing food waste, and personalizing the culinary experience.

title: Timeless Aura
description: Created a Luxury Watch Collection website featuring a modern, responsive design with smooth animations, high-resolution imagery, and intuitive navigation to showcase premium timepieces and elevate the brand’s digital presence and user experience.

title: EatEase
description: Led development of a food delivery system using SQL and NetBeans. Improved order management and streamlined the food delivery process.

title: Weatherly
description: Created an Android app using Flutter to provide real-time weather updates. Integrated OpenWeather API and optimized app performance.

title: Dhanasakhi
description: An expense management app designed to track spending, visualize expenses, and set budgeting goals for Rural Women in India.

title: Dots and Connect
description: A digital version of the classic dots and boxes game with multiplayer support and real-time scoring.
